TestCase.name: testUnionNullableTypes
TestCase.Resource: LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(_c0=[CASE(>($2, 0), $1, null:RecordType:peek_no_expand(INTEGER _1, VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE" _2))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], reuse_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[CASE(>(c, 0), b, null:RecordType:peek_no_expand(INTEGER _1, VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE" _2)) AS _c0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testFilterUnionTranspose
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$1], b=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], EXPR$0=[SUM($0)], EXPR$1=[COUNT($2)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 0)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, left, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, right, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[EXPR$0 AS a, b, EXPR$1 AS c]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$0, Final_COUNT(count$1) AS EXPR$1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$1]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, b, c]) :- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(a, 0)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, left, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(a, 0)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, right, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testInWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($2, { LogicalProject(a1=[AS($0, _UTF-16LE'a1')]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, _UTF-16LE'two')]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) })]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

HashJoin(joinType=[LeftSemiJoin], where=[=(c, a1)], select=[a, b, c], build=[right], tryDistinctBuildRow=[true]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], reuse_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1]) +- Calc(select=[a AS a1], where=[=(b, _UTF-16LE'two')]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testInWithProject
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b2=[AS(IN($1, 1972-02-22 07:12:00.333:TIMESTAMP(3)), _UTF-16LE'b2')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
Calc(select=[IN(b, 1972-02-22 07:12:00.333:TIMESTAMP(3)) AS b2]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testProjectUnionTranspose
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, left, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, right, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Union(all=[true], union=[b, c]) :- Calc(select=[b, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, left, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[b, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, right, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testUnionAnyType
TestCase.Resource: LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]]) +- LogicalProject(b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, A, source: [TestTableSource(a, b)]]], fields=[a, b], reuse_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[b]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
